Detailed Description

This class is a cache of all the overlappers for a given chunk.

It may include overlappers from neighbouring chunks which determine that they also overlap this chunk.

void ChunkOverlappers::bind ( bool  isUnbind  )  [virtual]

When we are bound, we tell all our overlappers to bind themselves.

It doesn't hurt to do this again when we've already been bound.

Reimplemented from ChunkCache.

void ChunkOverlappers::touch ( Chunk &  chunk  )  [static]

There should be a ChunkOverlappers in every outside chunk at first bind time or else the sharing system will not work if a chunk without any overlappers but which should have some binds after one which has them.

So we create an instance for each outside chunk (but can delete it later...)

Reimplemented from ChunkCache.
